website_summaries.verdict: A fun, extremely stable kayak that can double as a stand up paddle board.
pros: This award-winning model is designed for use in calmer waters
It features a platform on the stern that is suitable for kids or a pet
The gear track doubles as a convenient carry handle
cons: Although the under-the-seat storage is praised by many, some felt it positioned the seat a little too high for ideal comfort

customer_reviews.title: This is so amazing, you can paddleboard, you can kayak
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and use it for the first time, it's so easy to paddleboard on this unit, it's so nice to have a storage container for your phone and keys or a cooler. You can kayak, you can paddle board, whatever you need for the moment, you can do it. Sometimes situations change in the Terrain gets tough, sit down and Kayak. You should get the perception life jacket with this unit, it has a cut out part on the back for the seats so it's really nice. And addition, the highlife kayak paddle switch from a paddleboard paddle to a kayak paddle on demand, it's the most amazing Kayak I own and I own 3.
customer_reviews.author: Happy go lucky!

customer_reviews.title: Love it, even with some flaws
customer_reviews.text: Pros Absolutely a blast Well made Attention grabbing Convenience of being able to sit or stand Glides of water Built in cooler (that works great) Comfortable seat Cons Does swing/sway easily While paddle boarding it takes constant paddling to keep straight While kayaking because you are elevated it keeps you wet from all the splashing of the paddles Cup holder isn’t enclosed so your drink doesn’t stay It doesn’t handle waves well
customer_reviews.author: shelly1222

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: This kayak sup is sooo heavy even with wheels. Pros: great if have kids who are climbing into it and sitting on the back. Very balanced and doesn’t tip. Comfortable chair with storage underneath
customer_reviews.author: KonaLuv

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED!!! (UPDATED)
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived today, two days early. That's awesome! What is not awesome is the fact that a signature was required for delivery, and they just dropped it off outside. I didn't know it was here until I checked my email. Also, the board has three gouges, or possibly melted spots on the port-side. I paid a good chunk of cash for this board, and it should not be damaged. UPDATE: Changed my review from two to four stars. I received a scratch & Dent discount for the damage. Will update further after we try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: own 2 now
customer_reviews.text: Loved mine so I bought my husband one and he loves it. The dog loves going with use and she is 50lbs and there is no issues with her walking around on the boat or switching from boat to boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blemish is a hole. boat with hole bummer
customer_reviews.text: Listed as a blemish on the back was actually a hole in the bottom really wanted to use this today. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Inspect upon arrival!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the kayak BUT it arrived barely even packaged, marks on the bottom where it had been dragged across the ground, and marks/tears in the deck padding. For the price, I was sorely disappointed in this. I own two of these already at our vacation home on the coast and know they are excellent on the water.
customer_reviews.author: SHEENA H

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this STU/Kayak. I am not an experienced Kayaker but wanted something that is more comfortable for my dog but still wanted a seat. This is perfect with the flat areas for my GS to sit on, easy to stand up and get on. The only thing I wish was a bit diff is the Fin, wish it was collapsible. It is a bit of a pain to have to take off every time. Other then that absolutely love it. :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Questionable shipping, great product but could be cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I finally recovered received my Kayak today after a week late, the packaging it was wrapped in was torn up and it did not come with paddles like it says, but other than that the kayak was in great shape and I took it straight out to the water and borrowed my parents paddle, my German Shepherd was skeptic her first time on it but it'll take her a little time, gotta get her booties for her and trim her nails the padding had some holes and scratches from her so make sure your dogs nails are trimmed will. Also just think the are too many holes but still it will work well for me
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Zartuche

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled!
customer_reviews.text: Only have used it once so far, but so far I am loving it! It is very comfortable as a sit on top kayak. The stability for standing on it as a paddle board is perfect for me. I had one of my kids and my dog on it when I used it and we had a blast! I love the cooler under the seat and the fact it has a cup holder! So far ultra impressed.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. West

customer_reviews.title: Dog friendly
customer_reviews.text: Love it! While I do find it to be a bit heavy and difficult to paddle on rough waters I wouldn’t trade it for anything. My large dog and I love hanging out in calm waters.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: The screw does not hold the fin in place?????
customer_reviews.text: I just bought 2 of these Hi Life kayaks. The screw does not hold the fin in place on EITHER kayak. If there are threads in those holes, I can't see them. The screws just spin in the holes. I need someone from the manufacturer tell me what the heck is going on. How could they mess this up? I have tried contacting Customer Service with no luck so far. If I can't get the fins to stay on the boats, I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Demerino

customer_reviews.title: First use hull has water inside it...
customer_reviews.text: So we just bought this guy to spend the summer on the lake since covid is preventing us from doing anything else. We just used it for the first time and noticed the hull is filling with water.. this is the first time we used it.. I don’t think this is normal..
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: It just arrived and we are excited to try it out. Sadly, it arrived with a dent and rip in the non-slip material into the hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Lawyer/Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect SUP for a lake!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a total hit this summer on our lake. Its been great fun to hang out on and play - stable enough to easily pull yourself up on, jump off on, pull behind the boat, play on, etc. Probably not ideal for big waves on the ocean, but for calm inland waters its been a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gonyer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase.  Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hybrid Kayak/Paddleboard. Not as stable as a broader board, but worth every penny. I received it this afternoon and had it in the water in minutes. The only negative thing is the delivery. The entire wrapping was all ripped up and my seat was ripped as well. I was able to kind of fix it and it was pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent yak!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this kayak! It is sturdy and roomy. Very stable and easy to enter and exit. Tracks well with fin. Slightly heavier than I’m comfortable managing but is to be expected because of the length. Marine foam was damaged on arrival from shipping but Amazon made it right.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room to accessorize
customer_reviews.text: I havent been able to take it out on the water yet but I like the versatility of this kayak. I will be able to fish and go for a just a leisure day on the water. Lots of room to accessorize. Wish they had more solid color choices but other than that I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Mason

customer_reviews.title: Love this kayak
customer_reviews.text: Love this hybrid kayak. Very stable. Delivery company was great. Put it right in my garage. Kayak arrived in very good condition
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Love this Hybrid!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hybrid. Could not decide between a kayak or a sup so this is perfect. Plenty of space and very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: great ride
customer_reviews.text: this kayak is great my dog loves it. I love it! The only thing I was unhappy about was the way it was shipped to me. The plastic wrap was coming off and the was a permanent mark left where it was scraped. When you buy new you want it to look new when you get it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay S.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I have ever made! The ease and ability to transition from sitting to standing is so easy considering I struggled on a regular paddle board. I thoroughly enjoyed the option to sit and kayak or stand and paddle. Also supper easy to turn around get into the cooler. Worth every penny!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Cantwell

customer_reviews.title: Very stable and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! Exactly what I was looking for and so happy with the purchase. Haven’t taken my dogs out on it yet (I bought it for them LOL) but I think it will be perfect for the 3 of us!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J-C

customer_reviews.title: Great versatility!
customer_reviews.text: For a novice to both kayaking and paddleboarding, this is an awesome learning tool for both.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gerhan

customer_reviews.title: Shipping damage
customer_reviews.text: Huge dent, presumably caused by delivery company. It was not wrapped at all and also had many scuffs and scratches. Product itself is great, just not the shipping process.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: It works great.
customer_reviews.text: Can use kayak to sit or stand easily even for a big boy like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Mills

customer_reviews.title: Love the Versatility!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kayak for its versatility. Stand to paddle or sit when ever you want. The convertible paddle is a must addition.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie D

customer_reviews.title: Great hybrid option!
customer_reviews.text: Very stable and tracks well. Fun and easy to have the dog ride along or a grandkid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and clumsy in the water, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and stable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kayak. We got two for Christmas and my husband said that the seat is the most comfortable one that he’s ever tried and he’s been in a few kayaks. We used them last weekend and were comfortable for the whole 3 hrs that we were out. And they’re super stable. One advantage of this hybrid is that it’s easy to vary how we sit and this improves our comfort. I even sat cross legged for much of the trip and it was so comfortable. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jawhite

customer_reviews.title: Its versatility is its selling point
customer_reviews.text: I was struggling trying to decide between purchasing a kayak or a standup paddleboard, and fortunately I ran across this item. It’s probably not the most maneuverable kayak, but being able to switch between kayak and stand up paddleboard is invaluable. Also, I really like the fact that I am sitting up high while kayaking
customer_reviews.author: libu1968

customer_reviews.title: Bad color job. Kinda disappointed with look.
customer_reviews.text: I just received the funkadelic. Not impressed with the way that the color was applied. It looks sloppy. This is my first kayak/paddle board. Do they all look this way? I have not used it yet. I will post update on performance.
customer_reviews.author: Tina McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Stable and Comfortable SUP/Kayak
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once on a lake and it was very comfortable for the 1 1/2 hours, whether sitting or standing. It's a little heavy but not so much that I couldn't lift it myself out of the water and onto the dock. I am glad I got this hybrid (rather than having to buy both a kayak and sup). I wish it had a dedicated holder for the paddle(s) so it's easier to switch between the two when out on the lake, but the bungee cords worked well enough; it's possible the paddles can snap into the track but haven't tried that yet.
customer_reviews.author: JMorton

product_meta.title: Perception Hi Life 11 | Sit on Top Kayak - SUP/Paddleboard | Hybrid Boat with Seat Storage/Cooler | 11'
product_meta.description: The Perception Hi Life is the most versatile boat ever built featuring a sit-on-top design that can be paddled like a kayak or a stand up paddleboard It offers maximum stability and unique features to create an experience that's unlike anything else-and is perfect for sharing the water with kids and pets. The low-profile rear swim deck with handles makes it easy to get back on board after swimming Fun for all ages and abilities the Hi Life is up for any adventure whether that means cruising, swimming, fishing or simply relaxing with your favorite beverage.
feature_bullets: All the fun of kayaking and stand up paddle boarding combined in one - Made in USA
Designed for flat slow-moving and calm coastal water types
Perfect for sharing the water with kids and dogs
Bronze medal winner of the prestigious 2018 International Design Excellence Award (IDEA) in the sports leisure and recreation category
Front and rear swim decks with low sides and hand grabs make getting in and out of the water easy
Elevated seat with supportive fold-down backrest and thick padding throughout
Convenient drink holder keeps your favorite beverage from spilling
Built-in cooler under seat for drinks or snacks
Works well with the Hi Life Convertible Paddle (sold separately on Amazon)
Boat Length 11 ft | Boat Width 34"' | Boat Weight 55 lbs | Maximum Capacity 280 lbs

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
